column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////But to reiterate
column2: I am thankful for your visit to JINYA and for your kind words regarding our food. And while I may disagree with your rating
column4: and regret that you won't return. But while we didn't meet our ultimate goal with you
column5: we will continue to push forward
column6: respectfully having learned from this. Thank you.
